name: Cats Save Agoraphobia
description:
Global Game Jam 2019 theme was "What home means to you."

Home is the place I can rest easy, a calm place where I can put my troubles aside. 

In this game, you play as an agoraphobic person that has to go fetch something in town. If not for the cute kitties to pet along the road, the trip would be too stressful.

Credits : 

Louison Hernoux (programming, scripting, dynamic postprocess)

Alexis Jacquemin (3D Art (environment + CATS) + shaders)

Caroline Merlier (3D Art (character, environment) + rig + anim)

Music : Teddy Bear Waltz by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
